job_title: Graduate Software Engineer at Blackmagic Design
job_purpose: Join Blackmagic Design to work on high-performance software and global cloud-based platforms for the film, television, and broadcasting industries.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Work closely with experienced engineers to build products impacting film and broadcast industries
Rotate across engineering disciplines and gain exposure to different products and technologies
Contribute to real products used globally from day one
Collaborate with a tight-knit community of developers
Contribute ideas and explore new technologies in a supportive environment
required_qualifications: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
Solid programming skills in C++, Python, Java, or Go
Interest in cloud technologies, especially AWS
Strong problem-solving skills and willingness to learn
Good communication skills and ability to collaborate in a team
preferred_qualifications: Experience with Linux, Git, or relevant personal projects
company_details: Blackmagic Design creates advanced solutions for video editing, post-production, and live broadcasting used globally in Hollywood films, live events, and online content creation. They are expanding cloud engineering capabilities to support remote collaboration, real-time workflows, and scalable media infrastructure.
